query:
/*+ NoMergeJoin(t mi) NoMergeJoin(mi t mi_idx) NoMergeJoin(mi mi_idx t it1) NoNestLoop(it1 mc mi mi_idx t ct) NoHashJoin(ct it1 mc mi mi_idx t cn) NoMergeJoin(cn ct it1 mc mi mi_idx t it2) */ select min(cn.name) AS movie_company,
min(mi_idx.info) AS rating,
min(t.title) AS drama_horror_movie
from title AS t
inner join movie_info AS mi
on t.id = mi.movie_id AND t.production_year BETWEEN 1996 AND 2012 AND mi.info IN ('Thriller',
'Crime')
inner join movie_info_idx AS mi_idx
on t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id AND mi_idx.info > '12'
inner join info_type AS it1
on mi.info_type_id = it1.id AND it1.info = 'genres'
inner join movie_companies AS mc
on t.id = mc.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi.movie_id AND mc.movie_id = mi_idx.movie_id
inner join company_type AS ct
on ct.id = mc.company_type_id AND ct.kind = 'production companies'
inner join company_name AS cn
on cn.id = mc.company_id AND cn.country_code = '[us]'
inner join info_type AS it2
on mi_idx.info_type_id = it2.id AND it2.info = 'rating';
